Yandex Disk.name: P15.01
Yandex Disk.description: Does the company clearly disclose that it will notify the relevant authorities without undue delay when a data breach occurs?

Yandex Disk.name: P15.02
Yandex Disk.description: Does the company clearly disclose its process for notifying data subjects who might be affected by a data breach?

Yandex Disk.name: P15.03
Yandex Disk.description: Does the company clearly disclose what kinds of steps it will take to address the impact of a data breach on its users?
